directions.step:
Date: Wed, 24 Apr 1996 00:25:32 -0400
From: BobbieB1@aol.com
Cut angel food cake into 2 layers. Place layer on bottom then put 1/2 strawberries and 1/2 of Cool Whip. Repeat. Chill before serving. Recipe By: Kaz Langridge MM-RECIPES@IDISCOVER.NET
